biometric.title: Use {{biometricType}}
biometric.a11yHint: select whether to use {{biometricType}} to log in to the app
biometricsPreference.bodyText.touchID: Touch ID lets you use your fingerprint to sign in to this app.
biometricsPreference.bodyText.faceID: Face ID lets us recognize an image of your face to sign you in to this app.
biometricsPreference.bodyText.faceRecogn: Face recognition lets you use facial recognition to sign into this app.
biometricsPreference.bodyText.fingerPrin: Fingerprint lets you use your fingerprint to sign into this app.
biometricsPreference.bodyText.iris: Iris lets us recognize a video image of your eyes to sign you in to this app.
biometricsPreference.doYouWantToAllow: Do you want to allow VA Mobile to use {{biometricsText}}?
biometricsPreference.doYouWantToAllow.a1: Do you want to allow V-A Mobile to use {{biometricsA11yLabel}}?
biometricsPreference.skipA11yHint: do not allow the app to use biometrics. navigate to the home page
biometricsPreference.useBiometricA11yHin: allow the app to use biometrics and navigate to the home page
biometricsPreference.youCanAlwaysChangeT: You can always change this later in your app settings.
debug.title: Developer Screen
logout.title: Sign out
manageAccount.title: Manage your account
manageAccount.toConfirmOrUpdateEmail: To confirm or update your sign-in email, go to the website where you manage your account information.
privacyPolicy.a11yHint: Takes you to the privacy policy page
privacyPolicy.title: Privacy policy
shareApp.a11yHint: Opens your device's share sheet with a link to download the app
shareApp.title: Share the app
shareApp.text: Download the VA mobile app on the App Store: {{appleStoreLink}} or on Google Play: {{googlePlayLink}}
